children.text: Only a licenced plumber is qualified to fit this sewer pipe connection, however the concreter is likely to install it, and past history has shown that in the majority of cases, without using PVC primer and glue, often just pushed into place as the concrete is being poured. Additionally, the large area of steel reinforcement mesh that is to be removed for this smart pan may not have additional support provided before concrete is poured.
The builder will need to provide photographic evidence to the owner to confirm compliant sewer connection by the licensed plumber.
